code: import{useState}from'react';import'./Panel.css';import paperBin from'../../resources/paper-bin_5867779.png';import checkMark from'../../resources/check-mark-96.png';import employee from'../../resources/employee-9090435_1280.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Panel=_ref=>{let{addTask,deleteTask,toogleStatus}=_ref;const[inputValue,setInputValue]=useState('');const handleChange=e=>{setInputValue(e.target.value);};const handleSubmit=e=>{addTask(inputValue);console.log('Отправленное имя: '+inputValue);setInputValue('');e.preventDefault();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"panelBlock",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"panel",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"employee",src:employee,alt:"employee"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"addForm",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{className:"addLabel",children:["Add your task",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"addInput",placeholder:"create something new",type:"text",value:inputValue,onChange:handleChange})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"addBtn",type:"submit",value:"add task"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"btnBlock",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"checkMark",src:checkMark,alt:"check-mark",onClick:toogleStatus}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"paperBin",src:paperBin,alt:"paper bin",onClick:deleteTask})]})]})});};export default Panel;
